ygData.subject: Re: General Classes Rambling
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL.. don t know. Hoping to play on Tues after work -- though I am not sure on that. Will be attempting to group with a friend that s a Paly. Oh... and
ygData.messageBody:
LOL.. don't know. Hoping to play on Tues after
work -- though I am not sure on that. Will be
attempting to group with a friend that's a
Paly.<br><br>Oh... and since I forgot SK, Paly, and
Clerics...<br><br>Clerics. Good Clerics actually need to time their heals.
Healing is not easy. I notice Clerics healing too early
all the time. That can cause a groups death as easily
as a bad tank that doesn't pull the loner that peels
off to the healers.<br><br>Timing your healing makes
a difference. I know LOTS of Clerics and Healers
that don't know that if you heal-- you will never agro
a mob if the tank is under 1/2 life. Wait till he's
down 2 1/2 bubbles and you can heal without ever
agro'ing. Or do what I do-- I cast almost a full circle's
heal under. That saves mana b/c my specialization is
Alteration over all and I can time my med cycles. Plus I can
heal when tank's only 2 bubbles down usually without
getting agro'd.<br><br>SK. They've got fear and can use
pets. Not great Tanks but okay. Best thing about SK's
is in tough fights-- HT. Not much else I can say
about SK's. They tank about as well as a Ranger, and do
less overall melee damage. However, their spells make
them a welcome addition. I know very little about SK's
other than that I don't have them in a group
often.<br><br>Paly's. I love these guys too. Terrible tanks as I get
higher but the heals are a welcome sight to my poor
mana. Plus they can buff themselves so I don't have to
heal and they can STUN. Ever been in a Chain Stun
group? S' cool. Especially a Chanter, Paly, Wizzie chain
stun group. <br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS... sorry for
the rant on Clerics. Love them to death and their
Rezzes rock. But many clerics, don't seem to time their
heals well and I'm constantly pulling off mobs from
clerics. Snare, dot, stun, beg. They end up begging to
kill me. LOL.
